description: A superb slow-cook cut, Lamb Fore Shanks are cut from the lower part of the front leg and are much smaller than the traditional Lamb Shank. When slowly, gently braised, our Lamb Fore Shanks will deliver rich, tasty, fall-off-the-bone tender meat. We recommend serving two per person, although one makes an ideal meal for smaller appetites or kids.

Their neat size lets you pop them straight into the pot whole, where they will retain their shape and take added flavour from the bone. Try braising them with red wine, garlic and rosemary, and serve with seasonal vegetables and of course lots of the rich, thick gravy!

description: Thin little burgers of savoury grass-fed lamb, so good seared with rosemary and red onions. For a plateful of really delicious gourmet sliders, stack and skewer between small pieces of focaccia, dressed with fried onions, cucumber, yoghurt and mint – wow!

Sliders were traditionally ‘steam-grilled’ with onions on a flat hotplate – here’s how to achieve the same effect at home... Before frying your sliders, soften some chopped onions in the pan first. Pop the sliders on top of the onions so they part steam as they cook. Once the first side is done, flip each burger, pile any loose onions on top and press down with your spatula or fish slice so the onion juices mingle through the meat!

A slow cooked lamb stew, featuring hearty chunks of our distinctive grass-fed minced lamb, with classic garden vegetables, in a rich gravy. description: Smokies were traditionally hot smoked in old oak whisky barrels in and around the fishing town of Arbroath. Today, this intensely smoky speciality is still smoked only 50 miles away along the Aberdeenshire coast from us here at Donald Russell.

description: Pork shoulder has great marbling, a firm texture and lots of flavour. Our butchers have lovingly hand prepared these for you, so you can enjoy all the flavour of marinated pork with none of the waiting.

If you love the flavour of our Marinated Pork Shoulder Steaks but prefer a smoother, leaner texture, why not marinate our
in a mix of
It's important not to over-cook these delicious Marinated Pork Steaks as they will become dry and tough. I recommend no more than 2-3 minutes per side, and a good 5 minutes resting after cooking.

description: Involtini means ‘little bundles’ – ours are made of prime pork loin, rolled around a tasty stuffing of pecorino and other cheeses, with sweet shallots and peppery fresh rocket.
Part of our range of authentic Italian dishes, straight out of the family cookbook of ‘Nonna’ (‘Nana’) Gagliardi! To find out more about these original family recipes, click
title: 8x Pork Involtini

description: Prime, boneless free-range pork belly, carefully slow-cooked 'sous vide' until it is wonderfully tender. We've taken eight hours to cook it - you only need heat it for 40 minutes to crisp it up!

description: Our Slow Cooked Pork Shoulder is designed to make short work of a big meal, which makes it perfect for dinner parties or family gatherings. We've cooked this for 10 hours so all you have to do is pop it in the oven from frozen for 85 minutes.

description: The pork equivalent to a Rib Roast, with sweet meat made even tastier by cooking on the bone.

description: A really rich, soft, tender cut that will yield crackling to die for! Roast whole or cut into strips and prepare to be wowed. The tasty seams of fat add so much flavour and juiciness - not much wonder this great value cut is back in favour.

For beautifully crispy crackling, I suggest you carefully pour a freshly boiled kettle of water over this cut before you cook it. Pat it dry, then rub plenty of salt into the skin, which we've pre-scored for you. This gives delicious, crunchy crackling - my favourite.
title: Pork Belly, bone-In

description: The exquisite creamy flavour of the finest veal, amplified by being roasted on the bone.

title: 2 packs Slow Cooked Beef Olives in Onion & Ale Gravy

description: All four classic recipes in one handy box - enjoy them all without having to slave over a hot stove.

description: This cut is one of a chef’s best kept secrets! Once braised slowly, the collagen-rich meat becomes almost velvety soft. Already diced, you can now use this unusual old-fashioned cut just as you would any diced beef – just sear and casserole…
title: Diced Ox Cheeks

description: Create affordable, nutritious meals with this flavourful beefy liver. Our ox liver is hand sliced and fully kitchen ready, for your convenience.
title: 8x packs Ox Liver

description: We love to use it on all sorts of meat whether pan fried, roasted, BBQ or braised. It also gives a great flavour to seafood, for example, in a dressing for a prawn cocktail. Plus it comes in a handy re-usable jar.

description: Frikadellen are like tall little burgers, but with even more going on! Prime minced beef mixed with sweet and juicy pork, a balanced blend of savoury herbs and a touch of egg to add lightness. The result is so moist and tasty, and the crunch supplied by each burger’s dressing of gluten free breadcrumbs ensures you’ll finish it off to crisp perfection in the pan...
title: 8x Crispy Beef Frikadellen

description: We’ve teamed up with one of our favourite local makers, Isabella’s Preserves, to bring you this award-winning range of sauces and chutneys, based on old family recipes. Hand made in a small kitchen in rural Aberdeenshire, these will add spice and flavour to all your festive meals. Traditional Cranberry for Christmas Dinner, Ploughman’s Chutney for the Boxing Day ham, and our personal favourite – Hot Banana Chutney with just about anything!
title: Isabella's Sauce & Chutney Selection

description: Choose a burger with pedigree! Made from 100% Aberdeen Angus prime beef, our heritage burger celebrates the deep flavour of grass-fed beef in every succulent bite.

description: Add a touch of luxury to your quick, healthy stir-fries – by making them with pure sirloin steak! That’s right – only our premium, grass-fed, fully matured sirloin steak is hand cut into delicate strips, perfect for sizzling up with some crunchy veg.
title: Sirloin Stir-fry Strips

description: Wow your guests with thick, succulent slices of this show-stopping dish. Our mouth-watering, grass-fed Beef Wellington log is filled with prime centre cut fillet, duxelle mushrooms and tarragon, all encased in flaky buttery-enriched pastry.
title: Beef Wellington Log

description: Versatile cuts of our prime grass-fed, fully matured beef giving you a much richer flavour than using normal beef. Ideal for using in a vast range of tasty meals.

description: A selection of our best beef braising cuts, from Topside through to Minced Steak. Our Beef Meatballs contain nothing but our pure grass-fed, fully matured beef steak - absolutely no additives.
title: Braising Selection

description: You just can’t beat the richness of flavour that comes with long, slow cooking. Get meltingly tender, deeply tasty results every time with this top-quality selection of traditional cuts.
title: Braising Selection

description: You can't beat these great value cuts for sheer depth of flavour. Braising, pot-roasting or casseroling brings out the beautifully savoury taste, while the long, slow cooking gives an unbelievably tender result.
Includes FREE oxtail for that real traditional touch!
title: Traditional Braising Box

description: Also known as diaphragm steak, this thin and tasty steak has a loose grain and definite bite. Steak afficionados and those in the know have always coveted its very particular qualities – but it must be cooked briskly, and enjoyed very, very pink.
To find out about the story behind these steaks, click
title: 4x Skirt Steaks

description: In Brazil, this juicy cut is traditionally kept in one large piece, grilled on a sword and sliced to serve multiple diners. Here, our butchers have prepared it as convenient, pan-ready individual steaks – much easier!
To find out about the story behind these steaks, click
title: 4x Picanha Steaks

description: These speciality steaks are best enjoyed rare or medium-rare. For more information on how these steaks are cut and how to cook them, click

Onglet, AKA ‘hanger steak’, literally hangs in the centre of the carcase – it’s a totally unworked muscle so is very tender. It has an intense, deeply beefy flavour. No wonder butchers used to keep this hidden gem of a cut all to themselves!
To find out about the story behind these steaks, click
title: 4x Onglet Steaks

description: A tasty bone-in steak, ideal for hearty eaters, and particularly good flame-grilled or barbecued.
title: Rib Steak Bone-In

description: Generously marbled, our traditionally matured ribeyes are bursting with the mellow flavour of prime rib, and are juicy and succulent when cooked, especially when following our

The circle of fat between the fillet of ribeye and the ribeye cap should be around the size of a 50 pence piece, for the ultimate flavour. Sometimes there can be a trace of gristle left around this circle of fat, this is entirely normal and is a natural part of this steak.
title: 10x Ribeye Steaks 230g

description: Named for their shape - like an old-fashioned clothes iron which was heated in the fire, Flat Iron Steak used to be referred to as ‘butler’s steak’. While the lord of the manor would have eaten fillet or sirloin, the not-so-posh but still very tender flat iron would have been reserved for only the most elite servants of the household. Also known as featherblade steak, flat iron is cut from the shoulder, so has good marbling, a firm bite and deep flavour.
To find out about the story behind these steaks, click
title: 4x Flat Iron Steaks

description: Well marbled steaks you’ll soon become a fan of! The ribeye cut naturally extends up into the shoulder (or ‘chuck’) of the carcase – where the two meet, you get Chuck Eye Steaks! With the fat and flavour of ribeye, and a slightly firmer, humbler finish from the chuck, these steaks are an incredibly satisfying combination…
title: 4x Chuck Eye Steaks

description: Bavette is a delicacy in Mexico and Latin America, where it is marinated and grilled as arrachera. It’s a hard working muscle; lean, firm and with a long grain. Consequently it must be cooked short and fast – do this and you’ll be rewarded with a robust beefy flavour.
title: 4x Bavette Steaks

description: The exquisite creamy flavour of the finest, welfare friendly veal, amplified by being roasted on the bone.
title: Veal 2 Bone Rib

description: A selection of our most popular steaks, burgers and sausages, perfect for entertaining or everyday mealtime solutions. Featuring our 35 day matured, mouth-watering ribeye steaks, and delicate little fillet medallions – the ultimate in tenderness. Our meaty pork sausages are hand made by our butchers, and our burgers are made using only 100% pure minced steak – with nothing added whatsoever. Last but not least, we’ve included our chef’s special Perfect Seasoning – made to enhance all meats and more!
title: The Butcher's Classics

description: Makes great value and tasty meals - simmer gently for several hours with aromatic vegetables like onions and carrots to tenderise the long muscles and release the flavour.
title: Unsalted Ox Tongue

description: With Sirloin and Rump Steaks, Minced Beef and Burgers to choose from our butchers have outdone themselves this time, bringing you their favourite beef products together in one selection.

description: We were thinking – how could we make our Everyday Steak Selection even better? We’ve already got the finest, fully matured, grass-fed UK beef and free-range pork, to make it extra–delicious – what else? And then it came to us – throw in some of our crispy Alpine Fries!
title: Everyday Steak Box

description: These hefty, 250g Sirloin Steaks are a real treat for lovers of prime, grass-fed UK beef. Simply sizzle and rest for gorgeously caramelised, tender steaks. And we’ve added some of our 100% steak Mini Burgers and legendary Pork Sausages, absolutely free!
title: Sirloin Steaks PLUS Gifts

description: Enjoy 6 generous servings of the finest quality grass-fed, naturally reared steak. With flavoursome and tender Sirloin Steaks and some of our incredibly beefy rump cuts. Our Pavé Rump Steaks are thicker than traditional rump steaks, whilst our Pavé Rump Medallions are quick and easy to cook yet delicious. Plus, we've added some of our butchers' hand made Pork Sausages, Minced Steak and Mini Steak Burgers - made of nothing but pure grass-fed beef, with absolutely nothing added. not even seasoning.
title: Classic Steak Selection

description: Enjoy the finest quality grass-fed, naturally reared beef.  Our Fillet Steaks succulent and tender, whilst our Sirloin Steaks are special trimmed of excess fat. Our lean Pavé Rump Steaks are extra trimmed from a single muscle, whilst our delicious Pavé Rump Medallions are quick and easy to cook.
title: Premium Steak Selection

description: A selection of our most popular steaks, burgers and sausages, perfect for entertaining or everyday mealtime solutions. Our Sirloin Steaks are trimmed to remove excess fat so you get more meat for your money. Our Sausages are hand made by our butchers and our Burgers are made using only 100% pure minced steak, giving the most natural flavour and leaving you to season and garnish as you please.
title: The Butcher's Classics

description: Marinated in our very own BBQ style sauce, these lip-smacking 'spare ribs' cook in the oven from frozen!
title: 2x racks Sticky Pork Ribs, 800g

description: Juicy turkey crown – just the tender, white breast meat, so no wasteful leftovers!
With tasty, hand made snacks to start, all the premium quality meaty trimmings you could need, and a handy cookery guide to keep you right on the big day.
Merry Christmas, love from Donald Russell!
title: Turkey Crown Meal for 4

description: We've taken all the best-selling products in our Fish range and combined them into one handy selection, so you can enjoy all the flavours of the sea.

description: Superior fillets of soft, juicy wild whiting, sustainably fished from icy Atlantic waters. We've lightly coated these in crispy crumbs and pepped them up with fresh lemon zest, cracked black pepper and mineral salt.
Although every care has been taken to remove them, some bones may remain
title: 4x Breaded Whiting Fillets

description: Simply the best naturally smoked haddock - cook lightly as you would a fresh fish to enjoy it at its most succulent.
title: 4x Smoked Haddock Fillets

description: Hot-smoked salmon - enjoy as is or flake it into a wealth of dishes. So easy and versatile – it’s an essential freezer standby!
title: 4x Honey Roast Salmon Fillets

description: Punchy smoked flavours combine with the heat of black pepper; ready to eat for a tasty quick lunch.
title: 8x Smoked Peppered Mackerel Fillets

description: The Chateaubriand is the prized cut from the fillet head. Deliciously soft and tender, it's best served medium rare. Near heart-shaped when sliced, the meat has a sublime, subtle flavour.

The reason for the groove in the middle of the Chateaubriand is because of our master butcher's expert eye! We trim the silverskin from the fillet head so that you can enjoy all that you have paid for, with no waste left on your plate - giving you more meat for your money.
Carefully remove the Chateaubriand from its packaging by cutting along the length of the vacuum pouch, and gently turning out onto a plate. This will help retain its beautiful heart shape.
title: Chateaubriand

description: Perfect for pan-to-oven roasting, the tender meat is east to carve into cutlets- simply slice between the ribs
title: Traditional Rack of Lamb

description: Cut from the same fully matured, grass-fed, UK beef as our larger roasts, this is the perfect way to serve 2-3 people with a luxury roast beef dinner. Our butchers have hand cut the sirloin to include only the finest, most tender centre part, and have left a little cap of fat to keep it juicy as it cooks – you won’t forget this in a hurry!
title: Sirloin Mini Roast, 500g
